name: Hacker.exe
description: Hacker.exe is horror/strategy/puzzle that takes you to a near future where the internet has become a safer place due to world wide regulations. You start to question how safe the internet is because you as a hacker, keep noticing security organizations working with illegal business. That begs the question: Why are you even a hacker?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel or AMD Dual Core CPU Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: (Integrated): Intel HD Graphics or AMD (formerly ATI) Radeon HD Graphics (Discrete): Nvidia GeForce 9600 GT or AMD Radeon HD 2400 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 80 MB available space Sound Card: Any Additional Notes: 4GB RAM
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 and above Processor: Intel i7 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics or AMD (formerly ATI) Radeon HD Graphics (Discrete): Nvidia GeForce GTX 760 (or greater) or AMD Radeon HD 7600 (or greater) DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 80 MB available space Sound Card: Any Additional Notes: 8 GB of Ram
